```{r}
toplim <- 100
p1 <- ggplot(data = node_data) + geom_point(mapping = aes(
      y=overall_flux_n,
      x=max_influx_n,color=ratio),
      size=0.75) +
      scale_colour_gradientn(colours=rainbow(4)) + xlim(0,toplim) + ylim(0,toplim) +
      ggtitle('Mate: normalized trade fluxes') + ylab('Overall') + xlab('Maximum influx')
p2 <- ggplot(data = node_data) + geom_point(mapping = aes(
      y=overall_flux_n,
      x=max_outflux_n,color=ratio),
      size=0.75) +
      scale_colour_gradientn(colours=rainbow(4)) + xlim(0,toplim) + ylim(0,toplim) +
      ggtitle('Mate: normalized trade fluxes') + ylab('Overall') + xlab('Maximum outflux')
p3 <- ggplot(data = node_data) + geom_point(mapping = aes(
      y=overall_flux_n,
      x=ave_influx_n,color=ratio),
      size=0.75) +
      scale_colour_gradientn(colours=rainbow(4)) + xlim(0,toplim) + ylim(0,toplim) +
      ggtitle('Mate: normalized trade fluxes') + ylab('Overall') + xlab('Average influx')
p4 <- ggplot(data = node_data) + geom_point(mapping = aes(
      y=overall_flux_n,
      x=ave_outflux_n,color=ratio),
      size=0.75) +
      scale_colour_gradientn(colours=rainbow(4)) + xlim(0,toplim) + ylim(0,toplim) +
      ggtitle('Mate: normalized trade fluxes') + ylab('Overall') + xlab('Average outflux')
grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3,p4,nrow=2)
```

```{r}
kmeansdata <- node_data %>% select(
    node,
    overall_flux_n, 
    ratio,
    links_tot,
    links_net,
    between,
    triangles,
    eigen_w,
    eigen_u,
    net_group,
    max_influx_n,
    max_outflux_n,
    ave_influx_n,
    ave_outflux_n
    )

row.names(kmeansdata) <- kmeansdata$node

```

```{r}
tmp <- kmeansdata %>% filter(overall_flux_n > quantile(overall_flux_n,0.95))
tmp <- scale(tmp)
distance <- get_dist(tmp)
fviz_dist(distance)
```

```{r}
kmeansdata <- scale(kmeansdata)

ncmax <- 20
wss <- (nrow(kmeansdata)-1)*sum(apply(kmeansdata,2,var))
for (i in 2:ncmax) wss[i] <- sum(kmeans(kmeansdata, centers=i)$withinss)
plot(1:ncmax, wss, type="b", xlab="Number of Clusters", ylab="Within groups sum of squares")

set.seed(42) #Ensure reproducibility
nc  <- 5    #Pick a cluster number. TODO: pick it automatically
fit <- kmeans(kmeansdata, nc, iter.max = 25) #K-means
aggregate(kmeansdata,by=list(fit$cluster),FUN=mean)
kmeansres <- data.frame(node_data, fit$cluster) %>% rename(cluster = fit.cluster)

clusplot(kmeansdata,fit$cluster,color=TRUE,shade=TRUE,labels=2,lines=0)
plotcluster(kmeansdata,fit$cluster)


```
